content: Resale HDB HDB BTO Property Asked by AnonymousAsked on 10 Aug 2018What are the factors to consider between BTO or Resale HDB?A young couple looking to get our first home. Any tips or tricks would be useful!1 answerAnswerBump0

Png Cheng Xi DamienLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered on 10 Aug 2018BTO - game of chance, wait 3-4 years, most likley far from town, cheapResale - 100% can buy, no waiting time, free to choose location, around 2-3x more expensive than BTO0 comments0
